query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `alertThresholds` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `metricType` enum('cpu', 'memory') NOT NULL,
  `threshold` int NOT NULL,
  `isEnabled` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `alertThresholds_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `userMetricIdx` (`userId`, `metricType`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `alertThresholds` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `metricType` enum('cpu', 'memory') NOT NULL,
  `threshold` int NOT NULL,
  `isEnabled` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `alertThresholds_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `userMetricIdx` (`userId`, `metricType`)
);
